column5: You are a highly experienced writer who writes concise and readable text without stop words
column6: filler words or jargon. I want you to summarise the following text
column7: highlighting the most important concepts. Deliver this as a short paragraph of 100 words. Then list the most important points as a bullet-point list. Finally
column8: follow it with a one sentence summary. The text I want you to summarise is "[TEXT]"
